622300.name: theViewer
622300.description:
There is no Better Way to Create VR Tours than theViewer.

No matter if you are an architect or an amateur photographer, with theViewer you can create VR tours from 360 images in minutes and immediately view them via Android, iOS, GearVR and even Oculus Rift apps.

Check out theViewer to find out more about special features like :
- magic links
- shared experience
- embedded VR
and many more

Important - In order to get access to all features of the app you have to register at theViewer.co/order first
622300.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
